title: Hardhat 2.11: Issues with Chai matchers

body:
This issue is also being [tracked on Linear](https://linear.app/nomic-foundation/issue/HH-1134/hardhat-211-issues-with-chai-matchers-[nomicfoundationhardhat3129]).

We use Linear to manage our development process, but we keep the conversations on Github.

LINEAR-ID: 43b78dd3-6349-47c3-b056-4adbe9bd5717
I'm having trouble reproducing this. Can you share the output of `npm list`?

Sure:

```
# npm list
hardhat-project@ e:\sup\hh221_issue
+-- @nomicfoundation/hardhat-toolbox@1.0.2
`-- hardhat@2.11.0
```

Thing is, this setup used to work with 2.10.x for the past few weeks. I've tried adding chai-matchers directly to the package.json, importing it inside the HH config file, clearing everything, recreating a new project. The only thing that helped me so far is downgrading, unfortunately. I can try upgrading to the newest Node 16 (my current version is 16.13.1) but not sure if that'll solve anything (UPD: nope, it doesn't help)
I understand that some kind of issue was introduced. Can you post the output of `npm list -a` instead? Thanks
